FuncDef:
The ospfv3 mib-binding command binds an OSPFv3 process to SNMP and enables OSPFv3 to respond to SNMP requests.
The undo ospfv3 mib-binding command removes the binding. The ospfv3 mib-binding command binds an OSPFv3 process to SNMP and enables OSPFv3 to respond to SNMP requests. The undo ospfv3 mib-binding command removes the binding. By default, OSPFv3 processes are not bound to SNMP. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the OSPFv3 process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.
